item.title: Wall Street today: S&P 500, Nasdaq hit record high as jobs data bolsters hopes for Fed rate cut

review.headline_rewrite: Wall Street today: S&P 500, Nasdaq hit record high as jobs data bolsters hopes for Fed rate cut
bullets: In the bond market, the yield on the 10-year Treasury fell to 4.08% from 4.17% late on Thursday.
The 2-year Treasury yield declined to 3.48% from 3.59%.
Broadcom stock jumped 10.3% after the chipmaker reported stronger quarterly profit and revenue.
Smith & Wesson Brands stock soared 10.5% after the gun maker reported better quarterly results than expected.

item.title: Vedanta trumps Adani in closely-contested battle to win bid for Jaiprakash Associates

bullets: The battle for debt-ridden Jaiprakash Associates Ltd (JAL) ended in intense drama, with mining mogul Vedanta Ltd — a surprise contender in the fray

item.title: Apparel industry raises concerns on increase in GST on higher priced clothes, fear rise of grey market

review.headline_rewrite: Apparel industry raises concerns on increase in GST on higher priced clothes, fear rise of grey market
bullets: Apparel industry players have raised concerns about the increase of GST rate on garments priced above ₹2,500 from 12 per cent to 18 per
The Clothing Manufacturers Association of India in a letter to the PM said this increase could prompt several players to go back to the
While the prices of such apparel products will rise, concerns have also been raised regarding the complexity of implementation.
